==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|そう|ちょう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From ''sō'' ([[総]], of highest or supreme [[rank]]) + ''chō'' ([[長]], [[chief]], [[head]], [[president]])

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|そうちょう}}

# a chief of a whole system
# (in America) [[president]] of a university; (in Britain) [[chancellor]] of a university
# [[secretary-general]]

* {{l|ja|検事総長}} (''kenjisōchō''): attorney general
* {{l|ja|事務総長}} (''jimusōchō''): secretary-general
* {{l|ja|国連事務総長}} (''kokuren jimusōchō''): UN Secretary General
